channel.title: EXISTING [317 think]
channel.description:
Hello,
I wont to made me DClaws exist so they actully hit. Last post i made the guy who TRYED to help me gave me f all help..
What i wont to do is made me DClaws so they hit 4x instead of hitting with its fist when atting a NPC.
So can someone tell me how to make the DClaws exist so i can make all my other weapons/armor exsit please.
Sorry if it didnt give you eough help.
Thank You.

item.title: EXISTING [317 think]
item.dc:creator: @Teh_Moose Teh Moose
item.description:
@Teh_Moose wrote:

in client.java add the animation for the ID of dragon claws under getwepanim() or something like that. There should be already existing weps there so just copy the animation from one of those but change the ID.

Read full topic

item.title: EXISTING [317 think]

item.description:
@lordante wrote:

Hey they came Existed but when i attack they still hit with there fist
how i make them so the actully hit??

PM back

Read full topic

item.title: EXISTING [317 think]
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

right, what is the item id for your dragon claws? i’ll use ##### for now
it goes up in numbers so find where it should go in item.cfg. say it was 12000, you find the largest number bbefore that, like 11999 and add this in item = 12000 Dragon Claws A set of fighting claws. 2147000000 2147000000 2147000000 41 57 -4 0 0 13 26 7 0 0 56 2

now that’s finished save it. now compile and run, you don’t need to add to item.java, as it is a weapon

Read full topic
